Translations.Text: Ad Acare$ Loahennama yissek, akked wid, segsen, i k ivefoen, akken ma llan
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ taqdiat af waya. Ur lli$, nek, seg wid ippestaamilen
Neppa, s tidep, d asmekti kan i imavalen
Mi taadda tallit, war ccekk, a kwen id iawev usali s
Tarusi n Tezmamt s$uo Oebbi, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Ih, Nessader ak d Tazmamt, s tidep. Ihi, aabed Oebbi, s laaqida i Neppa

Day macci i Oebbi laaqida? Wid ippaddamen imawlan, war Neppa, nnan: "naabed iten kan, iwakken ad a$ rnun aseqoeb ar Oebbi". Ih, Oebbi ad Ieudd garasen, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden. Oebbi, war ccekk, ur Inehhu win illan d akeddab, d ajehli
Lemmer Ib$i Oebbi ad Isau aqcic, yili Ifren, deg wayen Ixelleq, ayen i S ihwan. Gedha s yiS! Neppa d Oebbi Yiwen, Aqehhao
Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Innev Iv i wass, Innev ass i yiv. Ieeppem i yiiij akked waggur, ad leun, yal wa, ar lajel ipwassnen. Day Neppa macci d Uzmir Ipsemmieen
